Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting Details4 OF US SAW THIS OBJECT IN THE SKY MAKING MOVEMENT IN A ZIG ZAG PATTERN. IT LASTED ABOUT 30 MINUTES. WE ALL WATCHED IN SILENCE. THEN IT JUST SHOT UP IN THE AIR AND WAS GONE. THIS HAPPENED MANY YEARS AGO BUT I STILL REMEMBER IT AS IT HAPPENED YESTERDAY. AT THE TIME WE WERE MOVING FROM OAHAU TO THE BIG ISLAND FOR TRAINING (MILITARY) AND WAS GETTING READY TO BED DOWN. SOMEONE LOOKED UP IN THE SKY AND BROUGHT IT TO OUR ATTENTION. OUR THOUGHTS WERE IT WAS A UFO. WE HAD BEEN UP FOR ABOUT 24 HOURS WITH NO SLEEP AND WAS GETTING READY TO BED DOWN FOR A COUPLE OF HOURS. WE NEVER DID SAY ANYTHING TO ANY ONE ABOUT SEEING IT.
Summary: A WHITE OBJECT IN THE SKY
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hilo
This sighting has never been favorited.
